chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: The purpose of libcallaudio is to make it simple for other applications to control audio routing and other audio related settings in mobile phone scenarios.
&package; provides synchronous and asynchronous APIs to switch audio profiles, change between the earpiece and the speakers and mute the microphone.

simplesect.para: If using Meson/Ninja use a dependency('&package_string;-&package_api_version;') dependency.
